titles.title: Light-Duty Natural Gas Vehicle Parity Act of 2018
A bill to direct the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to ensure that the treatment of natural gas vehicles is equal to the treatment of electric vehicles.
Light-Duty Natural Gas Vehicle Parity Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

term.name: Hybrid, electric, and advanced technology vehicles

bill.summary:
Light-Duty Natural Gas Vehicle Parity Act of 2018
This bill directs the Environmental Protection Agency to provide compliance and incentive values to natural gas vehicles that are at least equal to those for electric vehicles.
